sections.text: aMBa#sya pAqrE Buva#nasyaq maddhyEq nAka#sya pRuqShThE ma#haqtO mahI#yAn | SuqkrENaq jyOtI(gm)#Shi samanuqpravi#ShTaH praqjApa#tiScaratiq garBE# aqntaH || yasmi#nniqda(gm) sa~jcaq vicaitiq sarvaqM ~Myasmi#n dEqvA adhiq viSvE# niShEqduH | tadEqva BUqqtaM taduq Bavya#mA iqdaM tadaqkSharE# paraqmE vyO#mann || yEnA# vRuqtaM Ka~jcaq diva#M maqhI~jcaq yEnA#diqtya-stapa#tiq tEja#sAq BrAja#sA ca | yamaqntaH sa#muqdrE kaqvayOq vaya#ntiq yadaqkSharE# paraqmE praqjAH || yata#H prasUqtA jaqgata#H prasUtIq tOyE#na jIqvAn vyaca#sarjaq (vyasa#sarjaq) BUmyA$M | yadOSha#dhIBiH puqruShA$n paqSU(gg)Scaq vivE#Sa BUqtAni# carAcaqrANi# || ata#H paraqM nAnyaq-daNI#yasahiq parA$t paraqM ~Myan maha#tO maqhAnta$M | yadE#ka-maqvyaktaq-mana#ntarUpaqM ~MviSva#M purAqNaM tama#saqH para#stAt || 1 (10)

tadEqvarttaM tadu# saqtyamA#huq-stadEqva brahma# paraqmaM ka#vIqnAM | iqShTAqpUqrttaM ba#huqdhA jAqtaM jAya#mAnaM ~MviqSvaM bi#Barttiq Buva#nasyaq nABi#H || tadEqvAgni-stadvAqyu-stathsUryaqstadu# caqndramA$H | tadEqva SuqkramaqmRutaqM tadbrahmaq tadApaqH sa praqjApa#tiH || sarvE# nimEqShA jaqj~jirE# viqdyutaqH puru#ShAqdadhi# | kaqlA mu#hUqrttAH kAShThA$ScAhO-rAqtrASca# sarvaqSaH || aqrddhaqmAqsA mAsA# Ruqtava#H sam~MvathsaqraSca# kalpantAM | sa Apa#H praduqGE uqBE iqmE aqntari#kShaq-mathOq suva#H || naina#-mUqrddhvaM na tiqryaM caq na maddhyEq pari#jagraBat | na tasyE#SEq kaScaqna tasya# nAma maqhadyaSa#H || 2 (10)
na saqdRuMSE# tiShThatiq rUpa#masyaq na cakShu#ShA paSyatiq kaScaqnaina$M | hRuqdA ma#nIqShA mana#sAq&Bi klRu#ptOq ya E#naM ~Mviqdu-ramRu#tAqstE Ba#vanti ||

trINi# paqdA nihi#tAq guhA#suq yastadvEda# saviqtuH piqtA&sa#t || sa nOq bandhu#r-janiqtA sa vi#dhAqtA dhAmA#niq vEdaq Buva#nAniq viSvA$ | yatra# dEqvA aqmRuta#mAna-SAqnAstRuqtIyEq dhAmA$nyaq-Byaira#yanta || pariq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI ya#nti saqdyaH pari# lOqkAn pariq diSaqH pariq suva#H | Ruqtasyaq tantu#M ~MvitataM ~MviqcRutyaq tada#paSyaqt tada#Bavat praqjAsu# || paqrItya# lOqkAn paqrItya# BUqtAni# paqrItyaq sarvA$H praqdiSOq diSa#Sca | praqjApa#tiH prathamaqjA RuqtasyAqtmanAq-&&tmAna#-maqBi-saMba#BUva || sada#saqspatiq-madBu#taM priqyamindra#syaq kAmya$M | sani#M mEqdhA ma#yAsiShaM || uddI$pyasva jAtavEdO &paqGnanniRu#r.tiqM mama# | 4 (10)

paqSU(gg)Scaq mahyaqmAva#haq jIva#na~jcaq diSO# diSa || mAnO# hi(gm)sI jjAtavEdOq gAmaSvaqM puru#ShaqM jaga#t | abi#Braqdagnaq Aga#hi SriqyA mAq pari#pAtaya || puru#Shasya vidma sahasrAqkShasya# mahAdEqvasya# dhImahi | tannO# rudraH pracOqdayA$t || tatpuru#ShAya viqdmahE# mahAdEqvAya# dhImahi | tannO# rudraH pracOqdayA$t || tatpuru#ShAya viqdmahE# vakratuqNDAya# dhImahi | tannO# dantiH pracOqdayA$t || tatpuru#ShAya viqdmahE# cakratuqNDAya# dhImahi | 5 (10)

tannO# nandiH pracOqdayA$t || tatpuru#ShAya viqdmahE# mahAsEqnAya# dhImahi | tanna#H ShaNmuKaH pracOqdayA$t || tatpuru#ShAya viqdmahE# suvarNapaqkShAya# dhImahi | tannO# garuDaH pracOqdayA$t || vEqdAqtmaqnAya# viqdmahE# hiraNyagaqrBAya# dhImahi | tannO$ brahma pracOqdayA$t || nAqrAqyaqNAya# viqdmahE# vAsudEqvAya# dhImahi | tannO# viShNuH pracOqdayA$t || vaqjraqnaqKAya# viqdmahE# tIkShNa-daq(gg)qShTrAya# dhImahi | 6 (10)

tannO# nArasi(gm)haH pracOqdayA$t || BAqskaqrAya# viqdmahE# mahaddyutikaqrAya# dhImahi | tannO# AdityaH pracOqdayA$t || vaiqSvAqnaqrAya# viqdmahE# lAlIqlAya# dhImahi | tannO# agniH pracOqdayA$t || kAqtyAqyaqnAya# viqdmahE# kanyakuqmAri# dhImahi | tannO# durgiH pracOqdayA$t || saqhaqsraqpara#mA dEqvIq SaqtamU#lA SaqtA~gku#rA | sarva(gm)# haratu# mE pAqpaqM dUqrvA du#Hsvapnaq nASa#nI || kANDA$t kANDAt praqrOha#ntIq paru#ShaH paruShaqH pari# | 7 (10)

EqvA nO# dUrvEq prata#nu saqhasrE#Na SaqtEna# ca || yA SaqtEna# prataqnOShi# saqhasrE#Na viqrOha#si | tasyA$stE dEvIShTakE viqdhEma# haqviShA# vaqyaM || aSva#krAqntE ra#thakrAqntEq viqShNukrA$ntE vaqsundha#rA | SirasA# dhAra#yiShyAqmiq raqkShaqsva mA$M padEq padE || BUmir-dhEnur dharaNI lO#kadhAqriNI | uqdhRutA#&si va#rAhEqNaq kRuqShNEqna Sa#ta bAqhunA || mRuqttikE# hana# mE pAqpaqM ~MyaqnmaqyA du#ShkRutaqM kRutaM | mRuqttikE$ brahma#dattAq&siq kAqSyapE#nABiqmantri#tA | mRuqttikE# dEhi# mE puqShTiqM tvaqyi sa#rvaM praqtiShThi#taM || 8 (10)

mRuqttikE$ pratiShThi#tE saqrvaqM taqnmE ni#rNudaq mRutti#kE | tayA# haqtEna# pApEqnaq gaqcCAqmi pa#ramAqM gatiM || yata# indraq BayA#mahEq tatO# nOq aBa#yaM kRudhi | maGa#van Caqgdhi tavaq tanna# UqtayEq vidviShOq vimRudhO# jahi || svaqstiqdA viqSaspati#r-vRutraqhA vimRudhO# vaqSI | vRuShEndra#H puqra E#tu naH svastiqdA a#Baya~gkaqraH || svaqsti naq indrO# vRuqddhaSra#vAH svaqsti na#H pUqShA viqSvavE#dAH | svaqsti naqstArkShyOq ari#ShTanEmiH svaqsti nOq bRuhaqspati#r dadhAtu || ApA$nta-manyustRuqpala#praBarmAq dhuniqH SimI#vAq~j-Caru#mA(gm) RujIqShI | sOmOq viSvA$nyataqsA vanA#niq nArvAgindra#M pratiqmAnA#ni dEBuH || 9 (10)

brahma# jaj~jAqnaM pra#thaqmaM puqrastAqd-visI#maqtaH suqrucO# vEqna A#vaH | sa buqdhniyA# upaqmA a#sya viqShThAH saqtaScaq yOniq-masa#taScaq viva#H || syOqnA pRu#thiviq BavA# nRukShaqrA niqvESa#nI | yacCA# naqH Sarma# saqprathA$H || gaqndhaqdvAqrAM du#rAdhaqr.ShAqM niqtyapu#ShTAM karIqShiNI$M | IqSvarI(gm)# sarva#BUtAqnAqM tAmiqhOpa#hvayEq SriyaM || SrI$rmE Baqjatu | alakShmI$rmE naqSyatu | viShNu#muKAq vai dEqvAH CandO#-BiriqmAn ~MlOqkA-na#napajaqyya-maqBya#jayann | maqhA(gm) indrOq vajra#bAhuH ShODaqSI Sarma# yacCatu || 10 (10)

svaqsti nO# maqGavA# karOtuq hantu# pAqpmAnaqM ~MyO$&smAn dvEShTi# || sOqmAnaq(gg)q svara#NaM kRuNuqhi bra#hmaNaspatE | kaqkShIva#ntaqM ~Mya au#SiqjaM | SarI#raM ~Myaj~jaSamaqlaM kusI#daqM tasmi$n thsIdatuq yO$&smAn dvEShTi# || cara#NaM paqvitraqM ~Mvita#taM purAqNaM ~MyEna# pUqta-stara#ti duShkRuqtAni# | tEna# paqvitrE#Na SuqddhEna# pUqtA ati# pAqpmAnaq-marA#tiM tarEma || saqjOShA# indraq saga#NO maqrudBiqH sOma#M piba vRutraha~jCUra viqdvAn | jaqhi SatrUq(gm)q rapaq mRudhO# nudaqsvAthABa#yaM kRuNuhi viqSvatO# naH || suqmiqtrA naq Apaq OSha#dhayaH santu durmiqtrAstasmai# BUyAsuqr yA$&smAn dvEShTiq ya~jca# vaqyaM dviqShmaH || ApOq hiShThA ma#yOq BuvaqstA na# UqrjE da#dhAtana | 11 (10)

maqhEraNA#yaq cakSha#sE | yO va#H Siqvata#mOq rasaq-stasya# BAjayatEq ha na#H | uqSaqtI-ri#va mAqtara#H | tasmAq ara#~ggamAmavOq yasyaq kShayA#yaq jinva#tha | ApO# jaqnaya#thA ca naH || hira#NyaSRu~ggaqM ~Mvaru#NaqM prapa#dyE tIqrthaM mE# dEhiq yAci#taH | yaqnmayA# Buqkta-maqsAdhU#nAM pAqpEBya#Sca praqtigra#haH || yanmEq mana#sA vAqcAq kaqrmaqNA vA du#ShkRutaqM kRutaM | tannaq indrOq varu#NOq bRuhaqspati#H saviqtA ca# punantuq puna#H punaH || namOq&gnayE$-&PsuqmatEq namaq indrA#yaq namOq varu#NAyaq namO vAruNyai# namOq&dByaH || 12 (10)

yadaqpAM krUqraM ~Myada#mEqddhyaM ~Myada#SAqntaM tadapa#gacCatAt || aqtyAqSaqnA-da#tIpAqnAq-dyaqcca uqgrAt pra#tiqgrahA$t | tannOq varu#NO rAqjAq pAqNinA$ hyavaqmar.Sa#tu || sO#&hama#pAqpO viqrajOq nirmuqktO mu#ktakiqlbiShaH | nAka#sya pRuqShThamAru#hyaq gacCEqd brahma#salOqkatAM || yaScAqPsu varu#NaqH sa puqnAtva#Gamar.ShaqNaH || iqmaM mE# gaMgE yamunE sarasvatiq Sutu#driq stOma(gm)# sacatAq paruqShNiyA | aqsiqkniqyA ma#rudvRudhE viqtastaqyA-&&rjI#kIyE SRuNuqhyA suqShOma#yA || Ruqta~jca# saqtya~jcAq-BI$ddhAq ttapaqsO&ddhya#jAyata | tatOq rAtri#-rajAyataq tata#H samuqdrO a#rNaqvaH | 13 (10)

saqmuqdrA-da#rNaqvA-dadhi# sam~MvathsaqrO a#jAyata | aqhOqrAqtrANi# viqdadhaqd (miqdadhaqd) viSva#sya miShaqtO vaqSI || sUqryAqcaqndraqmasau# dhAqtA ya#thA pUqrva ma#kalpayat | diva#~jca pRuthiqvIM cAqntari#kShaq mathOq suva#H || yat pRu#thiqvyA(gm) raja#ssvaq mAntari#kShE viqrOda#sI | iqmA(gg) stadAqpO va#ruNaH puqnAtva#Gamar.ShaqNaH || puqnantuq vasa#vaH puqnAtuq varu#NaH puqnAtva#Gamar.ShaqNaH | EqSha BUqtasya# maqddhyE Buva#nasya gOqptA || EqSha puqNyakRu#tAM ~MlOqkAqnEqSha mRuqtyOr. hi#raqNmaya$M | dyAvA#pRuthiqvyOr. hi#raqNmayaq(gm)q sa(gg)Sri#taq(gm)q suva#H | 14 (10)

sa naqH suvaqH sa(gm) Si#SAdhi || ArdraqM jvala#tiq jyOti#-raqhama#smi | jyOtiqr-jvala#tiq brahmAqhama#smi | yO#&hama#smiq brahmAqhama#smi | aqhama#smiq brahmAqhama#smi | aqhamEqvAhaM mAM ju#hOmiq svAhA$ || aqkAqryaq-kAqrya#va kIqrNI stEqnO BrU#NaqhA gu#rutaqlpagaH | varu#NOq-&pAma#Gamar.ShaqNa-stasmA$t pAqpAt pramu#cyatE || raqjOBUmi#stvaqmA(gm) rOda#yasvaq prava#dantiq dhIrA$H || AkrA$nth-samuqdraH pra#thaqmE vidha#rma-~jjaqnaya#n praqjA Buva#nasyaq rAjA$ ( ) | vRuShA# paqvitrEq adhiqsAnOq avyE# bRuqhath sOmO# vAvRudhE suvAqna indu#H || 15 (11) (pura#stAqd - yaSOq - guhA#suq - mama# - cakratuqNDAya# dhImahi - tIkShadaq(gg)qShThrAya# dhImahiq - pari# - praqtiShThi#taM - dEBur - yacCatu - dadhAtanAq- dByO$ - &rNaqvaH - suvOq - rAjaika#M ca) (A1) Special Korvai ruqdrOq ruqdraScaq dantiqScaq naqndiqH ShaqNmuqKaq Eqva ca# | gaqruqDOq braqhmaq viqShNuqScaq nAqraqsiq(gm)qhaqstaqthaiqva ca# | AqdiqtyOq&gniqScaq duqrgiqScaq kraqmEqNaq dvAdaqSAmBa#si | SpEcial Korvai maq maq vaq caq maq suq vEq nAq vaq BAq vaiq kAqtyAqyaqnAya# | anuvAkaM - 2

jAqtavE#dasE sunavAmaq sOma#-marAtIyaqtO nida#hAtiq vEda#H | sa na#H par.Shaqdati# duqrgANiq viSvA# nAqvEvaq sindhu#M duriqtA&tyaqgniH || tAmaqgniva#rNAqM tapa#sA jvalaqntIM ~Mvai#rOcaqnIM ka#rmaPaqlEShuq juShTA$M | duqrgAM dEqvI(gm) Sara#NamaqhaM prapa#dyE suqtara#si tarasEq nama#H || agnEq tvaM pA#rayAq navyO# aqsmAnth svaqsti-Biqrati# duqrgANiq viSvA$ | pUSca# pRuqthvI ba#huqlA na# uqrvI BavA# tOqkAyaq tana#yAyaq Sam~MyOH || viSvA#ni nO duqrgahA# jAtavEdaqH sindhuqM na nAqvA du#riqtA&ti#par.Shi | agnE# atriqvan mana#sA gRuNAqnO$&smAka#M bOddhyaviqtA taqnUnA$M || pRuqtaqnAqjitaq(gm)q saha#mAna-muqgramaqgni(gm) hu#vEma paraqmAth saqdhasthA$t | sa na#H par.Shaqdati# duqrgANiq viSvAq kShAma#ddEqvO ati# duriqtA&tyaqgniH ( ) || praqtnOShi#-kaqmIDyO# addhvaqrEShu# saqnAccaq hOtAq navya#Scaq sathsi# | svA~jcA$gnE taqnuva#M piqpraya#svAqsmaBya#~jcaq sauBa#gaqmAya#jasva || gOBiqr-juShTa#maqyujOq niShi#ktaqM tavE$ndra viShNOq-ranuqsa~jca#rEma | nAka#sya pRuqShThamaqBi saqm~MvasA#nOq vaiShNa#vIM ~MlOqka iqha mA#dayantAM || 16 (14) anuvAkaM - 3

BU-ranna#-maqgnayE# pRuthiqvyai svAhAq , BuvO&nna#M ~MvAqyavEq&ntari#kShAyaq svAhAq, suvaqranna#-mAdiqtyAya# diqvE svAhAq , BUrBuvaqssuvaq-ranna#M caqndrama#sE diqgByaH svAhAq , namO# dEqvEBya#H svaqdhA piqtRuByOq BUrBuvaqssuvaq-rannaqmOM || 17 (1) anuvAkaM - 4

BUraqgnayE# pRuthiqvyai svAhAq, BuvO# vAqyavEq&ntari#kShAyaq svAhAq , suva#rAdiqtyAya# diqvE svAhAq , BUrBuvaqssuva#-Scaqndrama#sE diqgByaH svAhAq, namO# dEqvEBya#H svaqdhA piqtRuByOq BUrBuvaqssuvaq-ragnaq OM || 18 (1) anuvAkaM - 5

BUraqgnayE# ca pRuthiqvyai ca# mahaqtE caq svAhAq , BuvO# vAqyavE# cAqntari#kShAya ca mahaqtE caq svAhAq , suva#rAdiqtyAya# ca diqvE ca# mahaqtE caq svAhAq , BU-rBuvaqssuva#-Scaqndrama#sE caq nakSha#trEByaSca diqgByaSca# mahaqtE caq svAhAq, namO# dEqvEBya#H svaqdhA piqtRuByOq BUrBuvaqssuvaqr mahaqrOM || 19 (1) anuvAkaM - 6
pAhi nO agna Ena#sE svAqhA | pAhi nO viSvavEda#sE svAqhA | yaj~jaM pAhi viBAva#sO svAqhA | sarvaM pAhi Satakra#tO svAqhA || 20 (4) anuvAkaM - 7
pAqhi nO# agnaq Eka#yA | pAqhyu#ta dviqtIya#yA | pAqhyUrja#M tRuqtIya#yA | pAqhi gIqrBi-Sca#taqsRuBi#r vasOq svAhA$ || 21 (4) anuvAkaM - 8

yaSCanda#sA-mRuShaqBO viqSvarU#paq-SCandO$Byaq SCandA(gg)#syA viqvESa# | sacA(gm) SikyaH purO vAcO#paniqSha-dindrO$ jyEqShTha i#ndriqyAyaq RuShi#ByOq namO# dEqvEBya#H svaqdhA piqtRuByOq BUrBuvaqssuvaq SCandaq OM || 22 (2) anuvAkaM - 9
namOq brahma#NE dhAqraNa#M mE aqstva-ni#rAkaraNaM-dhAqrayi#tA BUyAsaqM karNa#yOH SruqtaM mAcyO$DhvaqM mamAqmuShyaq OM || 23 (1) anuvAkaM - 10
RuqtaM tapa#H saqtyaM tapa#H SruqtaM tapa#H SAqntaM tapOq damaq stapaqH SamaqstapOq dAnaqM tapOq yaj~jaqM tapOq BUrBuvaqssuvaqr-brahmaiq-tadupA$syaiq-tattapa#H || 24 (1) anuvAkaM - 11

yathA# vRuqkShasya# saqpuMShpi#tasya dUqrAd gaqndhO vA$tyEqvaM puNya#sya kaqrmaNO# dUqrAd gaqndhO vA#tiq yathA#&sidhAqrAM kaqrttE&va#hitA-mavaqkrAmEq yadyuvEq yuvEq havA# viqhvayi#ShyAmi kaqrttaM pa#tiShyAqmItyEqva-maqmRutA#-dAqtmAna#M juqguPsE$t || 25 (1) anuvAkaM - 12

aqNO-raNI#yAn mahaqtO mahI#yA-nAqtmA guhA#yAqM nihi#tO&sya jaqntOH | tama#kratuM paSyati vItaSOqkO dhAqtuH praqsAdA$n-mahiqmAna#mISaM || saqpta prAqNAH praqBava#ntiq tasmA$th saqptArciSha#H saqmidha#H saqpta jiqhvAH | saqpta iqmE lOqkA yEShuq cara#nti prAqNA guqhASa#yAq-nnihi#tAH saqpta sa#pta || ata#H samuqdrA giqraya#Scaq sarvEq&smAth syanda#ntEq sindha#vaqH sarva#rUpAH | ata#Scaq viSvAq OSha#dhayOq rasA$ccaq yEnai#Sha BUqta-sti#ShThatyantarAqtmA || braqhmA dEqvAnA$M padaqvIH ka#vIqnA-mRuShiqr-viprA#NAM mahiqShO mRuqgANA$M | SyEqnO gRudhrA#NAq(gg)q svadhi#tiqr-vanA#nAq(gm)q sOma#H paqvitraq matyE#tiq rEBann# || aqjA mEkAqM ~MlOhi#ta-Sukla-kRuqShNAM baqhvIM praqjAM jaqnaya#ntIq(gm)q sarU#pAM | aqjO hyEkO# juqShamA#NO&nuqSEtEq jahA$tyEnAM Buqkta-BO#gAqmajO$&nyaH || 26 (10)

haq(gm)qsaH Su#ciqShad vasu#-rantarikShaq-saddhOtA# vEdiqSha-dati#thir-durONaqsat | nRuqShadva#raq-sadRu#taq-sad vyO#maq-sadaqbjA gOqjA Ru#taqjA a#driqjA RuqtaM bRuqhat || GRuqtaM mi#mikShirE GRuqtama#syaq yOni#r-GRuqtE SriqtO GRuqtamu#vasyaq dhAma# | aqnuqShvaqdhamAva#ha mAqdaya#svaq svAhA# kRutaM ~MvRuShaBa vakShi haqvyaM || saqmuqdrA dUqrmir-madhu#mAq(gm)q udA#ra-dupAq(gm)qSunAq sama#mRutaqtva mA#naT | GRuqtasyaq nAmaq guhyaqM ~Myadasti# jiqhvA dEqvAnA#-maqmRuta#syaq nABi#H || vaqyaM nAmaq prabra#vAmA GRuqtEnAqsmin. yaqj~jE dhA#rayAmAq namO#BiH | upa# braqhmA SRu#NavacCaqsyamA#naqM catu#H SRu~ggO &vamId gauqra Eqtat || caqtvAriq SRu~ggAq trayO# asyaq pAdAq dvE SIqraq.ShE saqpta hastA#sO aqsya | tridhA# baqddhO vRu#ShaqBO rO#ravIti maqhO dEqvO martyAq(gm)q Avi#vESa || 27 (10)
